snippet: Politicians, educators and advocates of every stripe have offered clashing views on the results of this year’s standardized exams....
abstract: Politicians, educators and advocates offer clashing interpretations of results of 2016 standardized testing announced by New York State Education Dept; increase in proficiency rate for New York City students on English proficiency exam elicits celebratory news conference by Mayor Bill de Blasio, but State Education Commissioner MaryEllen Elia repeatedly points out that tests were shorter and given without time limit.
lead_paragraph: Politicians, educators and advocates of every stripe have offered clashing views on the results of this year’s standardized exams.

headline.main: New York State Test Scores Inspire Conflicting Interpretations
